casebody.data:
The NC State Bar
v.
Tillett 208PA15-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 15, 2016 Mr. Norman W. Shearin, Attorney at Law, Kitty Hawk, Mr. David P. Ferrell, Attorney at Law, Mr. Kevin A. Rust, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Tillett, Jerry R. Mr. G. Patrick Murphy, Attorney at Law, for The NC State Bar.

Ms. Jennifer A. Porter, Deputy Counsel.

Ms. Melissa L. Trippe, Special Deputy Attorney General, for N.C. Judicial Standards Commission.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of July 2016 by the N.C. Judicial Standards Commission for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of July 2016."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
